description: An Advisory sent when a Server has been removed from the cluster
title: io.nats.jetstream.advisory.v1.server_removed

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

server.description: The server name that was remove

server_id.description: The server ID that was remove

cluster.description: The cluster the server was in

domain.description: The domain the server was in
